definitions.text: a plant disease that produces a browning or scorched appearance of plant tissues

examples: my eyebrows singed when I bent over the flames

definitions.text: destroy completely by or as if by fire
examples: The wildfire scorched the forest and several homes

definitions.text: burn slightly and superficially so as to affect color
examples: The cook blackened the chicken breast
The fire charred the ceiling above the mantelpiece

definitions.text: become scorched or singed under intense heat or dry conditions
examples: The exposed tree scorched in the hot sun
